document_data.name: Flames of Phlegethos
document_data.mainbody: '''''Flames of Phlegethos''''' was a [[spell]] used by [[warlock]]s of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], particularly those who forged infernal pacts.
document_data.Abilities: The warlock summoned from the plane of [[Phlegethos]] streams of liquid fire, with which they doused a target within {{SI|50|ft|long=yes}}, burning their flesh and anything flammable. Even if the creature survived the initial onslaught, the flames continued to burn until put it out.
